description:
Once upon a time, in the vibrant world of WebtrES, there existed a unique and fascinating robot named Flicker. Flicker, a proud member of the WebtrES club, had a captivating background story that set it apart from the others.

Flicker was designed with an oscilloscope theme, sporting a sleek and eye-catching orange box as its main body. This vibrant color gave Flicker a sense of energy and enthusiasm that radiated from its very core.
